alert.note: Alert for Dubuque; Jackson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 4:43PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jo Daviess, north central Jackson and central Dubuque Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 443 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dubuque, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... East Dubuque around 450 PM CDT. Menominee around 500 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Galena, St. Donatus and La Motte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
